map.cmdDescription: Maps an extension to a specific webstore
map.StoreNameFlagDescription: The name of the webstore to map the extension
map.errStoreName: Can't find webstore with the name:
map.error: Error while mapping the given registered extension name:
map.extensionPointNameDescription: Means of identifying entry points within the domain code that are capable of being extended by partners.Takes the form domain_sub-domain_interface. E.g: checkout_summary_computeTax
map.errorEPN: Invalid EPN. Run [commerce:extension:points:list] for all valid EPN values
map.nonexistent: Can't find extension with registered extension name:
map.undefinedName: Undefined webstore ID and webstore name. Enter either '-i <webstoreId>' or '-n <webstoreName>'.
map.errMultipleStoreWithSameName: More than one webstore found with the given name. To see all the webstores with the given name, run [sf data query -q SELECT ID, NAME FROM WEBSTORE WHERE NAME = '<webstoreName>' --json] and use '-i <storeId>' to specify a specific webstore.

unmap.cmdDescription: Unmaps an extension from a store
unmap.StoreNameFlagDescription: The name of the webstore to map the extension
unmap.errStoreName: Can't find webstore with the name:
unmap.error: The mapped extension could not be found with the registered extension name:
unmap.extensionPointNameDescription: Means of identifying entry points within the domain code that are capable of being extended by partners.Takes the form domain_sub-domain_interface. E.g: checkout_summary_computeTax
unmap.errorEPN: Invalid EPN. Run [commerce:extension:points:list] for all valid EPN values
unmap.undefinedName: Undefined webstore ID and webstore name. Enter either '-i <webstoreId>' or '-n <webstoreName>'.
